title: Valeri Glushakov
text:
Valeri Nikolayevich Glushakov (; March 17, 1959 in Enthusiast <a href="sovkhoz">sovkhoz</a>, <a href="Nura%20District">Nura District</a>, <a href="Karagandy%20Province">Karagandy Province</a> – March 29, 2017) was a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and coach. He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20First%20League">Soviet First League</a> in 1977 for <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Moscow">FC Spartak Moscow</a>.
Personal life.
He was the uncle of <a href="Denis%20Glushakov">Denis Glushakov</a>.
